name: Action Platformer Project
description:
This is a project I worked on over the last month to practice game development, mainly programming. I focused on making a fun little game that could work as a framework for bigger projects in the future. 

Share your time in the comments if you are able to beat the game!

Current Record Holder: Yayo - 1:07:29

As a programmer, I dedicated my time to coding and developing the systems within the game. All the 2D art, music and sounds were downloaded from the internet and are linked bellow. Thanks to all these people for providing assets for game developers like me to prototype and test their games.

https://oco.itch.io/medieval-fantasy-character-pack

https://oco.itch.io/medieval-fantasy-character-pack-2
